prompt: A hyper-realistic cinematic 8k masterpiece featuring a rugged samurai warrior in a heroic low-angle pose, his body oriented forward with a determined, stoic expression. He has messy dark brown hair and subtle facial stubble, wearing a weathered charcoal-black kimono robe layered over a deep red undergarment, secured by a thick crimson silk sash. His right hand firmly grips the hilt of a katana held at a downward angle, while falling red maple leaves and glowing embers swirl around him. The setting is a traditional Japanese village at sunset, with tiered pagoda roofs and vibrant orange autumn foliage framing the scene. The composition uses a 35mm wide-angle lens style to emphasize his imposing stature, with dramatic golden hour backlighting creating a sharp rim light on his silhouette. The color palette is dominated by intense vermillion and deep blacks in a 60:30 ratio, with high-fidelity skin textures and intricate fabric weaves visible. The lighting is dramatic and high-contrast, featuring sharp focus on the subject and a soft bokeh effect on the distant architectural details, no text, textless, no words, no letters.
